Equipment Actions.Action 1: Greatsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 22 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Slaying Longbow, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 150/600ft, Average Damage: 15 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Solar makes 2 attacks with its Greatsword
Other Actions.Action 2: Flying Sword, The Solar releases its greatsword to hover magically and can mentally command the sword to move and attack
Other Actions.Action 3: Healing Touch, The Solar touches another creature and magically heals them, as well as cure them of any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness

Abilities.Ability 1: Angelic Weapons, The Solar's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra Average 27 Radiant damage
Abilities.Ability 2: Divine Awareness, The Solar knows if it hears a lie
Abilities.Ability 3: Innate Spellcasting, The Solar can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Resistance: Has advantage on saving throws againts spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Teleport, The Solar magically teleports to a point it can see up to 120ft
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Searing Burst, The Solar emits magical, divine energy, dealing fire and divine energy to creatures around it
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Blinding Gaze, The solar targets one creature and attempts to blind it with magic
